transcript:
Customer: Sir ye 10 me follow up close kar dijiye 3 din ho gaya.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Sir very good afternoon. Karishma Fiber Glass mein baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji main Reena baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se Durgesh ki senior.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Ji actually aapne abhi ek video meet ke liye check kiya tha apne seller application se. To Durgesh ke sath shayad aapki ek Google Meet pe meeting bhi schedule thi regarding ye services sir.
Customer: Ek minute baat karunga.
Executive: Achcha kab tak connect kar lo sir?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji main ye keh rahi hu sir ki Durgesh se aapki baat hui hogi video meet ke regarding Google Meet pe. Kyunki aapko service ka kuch discussion karna tha sir.
Customer: Haan unse baat unka call aaya tha main busy tha office se baat karni hai na.
Executive: Achcha to abhi main meeting schedule karwa du sir agar aap free ho to?
Customer: Haan main unse connect kar lunga.
Executive: Haan aap unse ek baar connect kar lo. Baki services vagera mein matlab kya kuch issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Issue pura issue hi hai mam koi matlab hai nahi. Aap mujhe thoda ek baar short mein kam aa nahi raha hai.
Executive: Kam matlab kya jaise bylead convert nahi ho rahi hai ya lead nahi aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Convert kahan hai bylead aayi nahi abhi dhang ki kahan hai ki convert ho. Pareshan ho gaya hu har baar main aapko platform pichle char panch saalon se use kar raha hu. Aapka regular main to premium wala hu mere pass verified wo hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo aapka TrustSeal hai mere pass.
Executive: Maximizer hai. Haan website service sir ji.
Customer: Fir bhi koi matlab hai nahi do saal se bas main bolta hu lead nahi aa rahi ke sir ye log product mein ye likh dete hain. Product mein wo likh dete hain aap hi category to galat hai khud nahi kari hai fir bolte category galat hai. Sir iska ye score karo ye aa jayega wo aa jayega 10 din do mere ko 15 din do mere ko.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aise karke itne saal to nikal diye koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: To abhi aap ye keh rahe ho matlab jab se aapne ye Maximizer service I guess aapne September mein aapki service live hui hai August mein aapne liya tha ye service. To uske baad se ye jo byleads aapke pass aa rahi hai jaise abhi main dekh rahi hu FRP product ke.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Kya karu main byleads ka mere pass dhang ki byleads aa nahi rahi koi.
Executive: To byleads kaise aa rahi hai?
Customer: Sab faltu aa rahi hai jo 5000 ki 4000 ki ye byleads rehti hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi agar main module FRP FRP module mein toilet ki bylead bhi aayi hai aapke pass aath piece ki jo order value hai.
Customer: Main apne region mein karunga na mam. Mujhe south ki lead jahan par jahan ke location maine ban kar rakhi hai non preferred location mein dal rakhi hai wahan ki leads aa rahi hai mere pass. Mere pass Rajasthan ki koi lead nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Jodhpur mera main main district hai wahan wahan ki pure din mein ek bhi lead nahi aati kya karu main.
Executive: To aap Jodhpur mein agar bylead nahi aati hai to Jodhpur se aapko inquiry to aa rahi hogi na sir direct inquiry jo hai.
Customer: Nahi hai.
Executive: Kyun?
Customer: Aaj bhi ek aapko inquiry aayi thi ye IWC India pan toilet seat ki ye Rama jiska naam hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Deal hi nahi karta main deal hi nahi karta kya karu us lead ka.
Executive: Achcha toilet seat mein aap deal nahi karte ho India toilet seat.
Customer: Main FRP ke usme deal karta hu wo hi nahi meri lead ki kyun lu main.
Executive: Dekho bylead mein kya hota hai na sir bylead mein customer jo hai na kabhi kabhi.
Customer: Main batau mam jab Maximizer maine join kiya to mujhe bol raha bola gaya tha aapke jo team ki taraf se meri baat hui thi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Unhone kaha tha ki aapki website banegi Google par promotion hoga aapki location jo hai aapke 500 kilometer ke area ke andar aap top search mein aayenge. Jaise ki dusri jagah koi search karta to wahan par nahi aata deal in Delhi deal in Jaipur ye aapki jagah sab aayegi aapke calls badh jayenge ulta mere to ghat gaye koi matlab nahi hua.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Calls ghat gaye aapke calls to sir aapke.
Customer: Dekhiye meri meri ID khol ke dekh lijiye main jhoot bol raha hu.
Executive: Nahi calls to sir dekho aapke pass pehle 20 aa rahe the abhi aapke pass 30 35 ka thoda sa flow bada hai inquiry bhi aapki badi hai.
Customer: Nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi badi hai calls kam hui hai.
Executive: Calls to sir isme dikha raha hai aapka aap mujhe ye batao aapko sirf Rajasthan mein hi deal karna baki alag kisi region mein deal nahi karna sir?
Customer: Karunga main north mein karunga west mein jo mera region hai usme karunga.
Executive: Achcha man lijiye Goa Goa se agar koi bylead aa rahi hai to aap usko entertain nahi kar sakte?
Customer: Ji nahi.
Executive: Kyunki abhi jo conversion bahut rarely hota hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Kyun karu main? Aur man lijiye agar UP mein Bareli vagera se aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan fir bhi hogi wahan par chances hai.
Executive: Achcha abhi abhi jaise FRP product ki aapko aayi thi 25 piece ki hai Bareli UP se to ye apne kam ki hai sir isko aap matlab consume kar sakte ho?
Customer: Kya piece hai khali unhone FRP product likh diya mam.
Executive: 25.
Customer: Range bahut badi hai usme main plastic product likh deta hu uska matlab ye nahi ki sare plastic product mein deal karta hu.
Executive: Aur ye to isliye bylead aa rahi hai kyunki aapne na India ek toilet ke naam se aapne product add kiya tha toilet mein to sir dekho Indian bhi ho gaya aapka aapka jo hai western bhi aa gaya aur multiple category ki lead aa sakti hai.
Customer: Main aapko specific kar du lekin aapke wo category hai hi nahi to main kya karu mujhe majburi mein karna padta hai.
Executive: Aapka kaun sa hai specific?
Executive: Aapka kaun sa hai specific aap mujhe bataoge FRP hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai. Ceramic floor mountain toilet seat bhi hoga aapka?
Customer: Ceramic hi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: FRP mein deal karta hu kya kam mere liye.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Wo product ke name se hum add kar denge.
Executive: Jo aapko Indian toilet ki aa rahi hai aap usko not relevant mark kar dena aur rahi baat bulk quantity ki to aapki city se bulk quantity ki maximum bylead aa rahi hai but wo lead aapke purchase karne se pehle sold out ho rahi hai sir. Aap jaise agar.
Customer: Wo lead nahi mere pass inquiry aani chahiye na mere district ki hai uski to direct mere pass inquiry aani chahiye lead kyun aayegi mere pass.
Executive: To fir aap kitni bhi denge to kya matlab hua.
Executive: Inquiry bhi aayi hai sir aapke pass pehli abhi aap apna lead manager open kar sakte ho?
Customer: Abhi rukiye main karta hu. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aap mere dusre wale number par call kariye na 96 wale pe.
Executive: 96 wale pe main ek kam karti hu 96 wale achcha ek kam karo sir aap Google Meet ka hi link hum aapko share kar rahe hain aap join kar lo meeting.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai main Durgesh ko bolti hu Durgesh aapko turant link share kar raha hai aur 96 wale pe ek bar call kar leta thik hai aapke primary email ID pe link jayega sir aap usko ek bar join kar lo fir ek ek lead aur us pe kya resolution hai kis tarike se hum bylead aapko dekho bylead to aa rahi hai but wo sold out ho rahi hai no doubt. Ab uske liye hum auto refresh download karwa denge aapke catalog mein wo downloaded rahega wo 10 second mein aapka jo bylead ka wo hai option wo auto refresh hota rahega sir. Usse ye rahega ki bylead aapke consume karne se pehle sold out nahi hogi. Main Durgesh ko bolti hu Durgesh meeting ka link bhej raha hai. Thik hai Durgesh aap sir ko meeting ka link bhejo sir join kar rahe hain. Sir aap join karo aapko do minute mein link aa raha hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Website and Google promotion not as promised.

- Calls decreased after Maximizer service.

- Wants leads only from specific regions.



Resolution:

- Executive offered Google Meet to discuss issues.

- Auto-refresh download for catalog to avoid sold-out buyleads.

- Executive will ask Durgesh to share meeting link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, maximizer, google meet, region, inquiry
